channel.title: Explicity || The Ultimate Gaming Experience ||
channel.description:
[IMG]http://i44.tinypic.com/1zg52lt.png[/img]
Hey, Development team here now, I need server and client programmers, A Hoster and GFX Designers. And Possibly A Website Designer.
Check the development thread: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,525224.0.html
Media:
[IMG]http://i42.tinypic.com/uvwuc.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i40.tinypic.com/wsmsz4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://i39.tinypic.com/vq5p4o.png[/img]
I shall add more pictures when I have the time as I have no idea what to take the pictures of because this development has just started.
Server Coders: (1/4) Only Me Client Coders: (1/4) Only Me Website Designer: (1/1) GFX Designers: (2/2) Hoster: (1/1)
[code=text]Format:
Name: Age: Applying For: Experience: Proof: How active will you be: MSN/Skype:[/code]

item.dc:creator: @Mr_Rushed Mr Rushed
item.description:
@Mr_Rushed wrote:

[quote=“NotLikingThis, post:15, topic:422566”]Format:

Name:Daniel
Age:16
Applying For:Website Designer, GFX Desginer, Hoster(If needed)
Experience:2-3 Years in all 3.
Proof:This is a site i am currently designing for my friend. He requested SMF: http://rez-gaming.comule.com. I do many GFX stuff like, Templates(Website), Logos, signatures etc. My computer can be on 24/7 for hosting and i have hosted many servers. I can create sites using Dream Weaver or just regular Notepad.
How active will you be:I can be on anytime you need me.
MSN/Skype:MSN: cauze_havoc@live.com SKYPE: ReZ-Gaming
Note: I am currently in my own project as well but i will still be able to help whenever i am needed.[/quote]

Accepted, As web designer and GFX looks good pm me and get on msn I will add you.

Read full topic
